REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A RM f0099 reute b f T--U.S.-BILL-AUCTIONS-SE 03-09 0075

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. BILL AUCTIONS SEEN AT 5.63-65, 5.59-61 PCT
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Treasury's weekly auction is expected to produce an average rate of 5.63-65 pct for three-month bills and one of 5.59-61 pct for six-month bills, dealers said. Shortly before auction time on the new bills, the rate on the outstanding three-month bills was unchanged at 5.64 pct bid, while the rate on the six-month bills was one basis point higher at 5.68 pct bid. Reuter
